skill_constraints: Single developer for DirectX (RISK-003); single developer for DevOps (RISK-006).
mitigation_strategies: Aggressive pair programming and knowledge transfer from graphics dev to fullstack dev.

skill_constraints: Ramp-up time for new DevOps contractor.
resource_bottlenecks: Senior Graphics Developer (still a bottleneck, but fullstack dev has more time to pair).
mitigation_strategies: Hire a part-time DevOps contractor for Sprints 5-7 to handle all deployment tasks, freeing up fullstack dev to focus on viewer cross-training.
